ids.name: Get Current Animation Frame
ids.description: Returns the current animation frame that the current sub action animation is on

ids.name: Get Current Damage
ids.description: Returns how much damage the player currently has

ids.name: Get Current X Position
ids.description: Returns the player's current x position. Can also be used in articles to get a current article instance's current x position.

ids.name: Get Current Y Position
ids.description: Returns the player's current y position. Can also be used in articles to get a current article instance's current y position.

ids.name: Get Facing Direction
ids.description: Returns the direction the player is currently facing -- 1 for right, -1 for left. Can also be used in articles to get an article instance's current facing position.

ids.name: Get Vertical Velocity
ids.description: Returns player's current vertical velocity

ids.name: Get Horizontal Velocity
ids.description: Returns player's current horizontal velocity

ids.name: Get Velocity Right
ids.description: Returns player's current velocity rightward

ids.name: Get Velocity Left
ids.description: Returns player's current velocity leftward

ids.name: Get Velocity Up
ids.description: Returns player's current velocity upward

ids.name: Get Velocity Down
ids.description: Returns player's current velocity downward

ids.name: Get Current Sub Action Id
ids.description: Returns the sub action id that is currently executing

ids.name: Get Current Action Id
ids.description: Returns the action id that is currently executing

ids.name: Get Current Held Item Id
ids.description: Returns the item id that the player is currently holding

ids.name: Get Max Jump Count
ids.description: Returns how many midair jumps the player has available

ids.name: Is Player Dead
ids.description: If set, player dies immediately

ids.name: Is Player Unable to Die
ids.description: If set, Player cannot die off the boundaries of the stage

ids.name: Is Tag Invisible
ids.description: If set, tag is invisible (the "name" that hovers over a player during a match)

ids.name: Is Unable to Grab the Ledge
ids.description: If set, player cannot grab a ledge

ids.name: Is Unable to Teeter
ids.description: If set, player is unable to teeter over a ledge

ids.name: Number of Jumps Used
ids.description: The current number of midair jumps used before touching the ground

ids.name: Number of Wall Jumps performed
ids.description: The current number of wall jumps performed before touching the ground

ids.name: Number of Footstools Performed
ids.description: The current number of footstools performed before touching the ground

ids.name: Falling Time
ids.description: The current length of time the player has been falling for

ids.name: Swimming Time
ids.description: The current length of time the player has been swimming for

ids.name: Attacks Performed
ids.description: Number of attacks performed in the current match

ids.name: Costume Id
ids.description: The player's current costume id. This is commonly used to make costume-specific functionality in movesets.

ids.name: Shield Health
ids.description: How much shield health the player currently has. The max (full health) is 50.

ids.name: Float In Place
ids.description: If set, player floats in place (cannot fall)

ids.name: Is Allowed to Fast Fall
ids.description: If set, player is allowd to fast fall

ids.name: Is Landing Lag Possible
ids.description: If set, when player touches the ground they will experience landing lag (this is commonly used in aerials subactions such as Nair, Fair, etc.)
